Captivating the hearts and imaginations of a new generation. Redefining the legendary service, experiences — and city — with renewed passion, purpose, and intention. Through sumptuous accommodations, delicious food and drink, shopping, restorative wellness services, and warm, generous hospitality, The Charleston Place stirs the senses and lives forever in the minds and souls of all who gather. Once complete, The Charleston Place will blend Southern hospitality with timeless European elegance, creating an inviting space that fosters connection and enriches lives. CP Reimagined. Whether you’re planning a corporate meeting, national conference, intimate wedding, or grand gala, we offer the spaces, amenities, and gracious service to create extraordinary bespoke experiences that build loyalty, nurture relationships, and create enduring impact. Feel confident knowing you’ll have the care and undivided attention of highly-skilled specialists to anticipate and meet every need and exceed every expectation. About us For any occasion 40,000 Square feet of ballroom, conference rooms, hospitality suites and more Charleston Praise From the folks we worked directly with to everyone we interacted with it was a TOP notch experience. Raynor Garage Doors Our meeting grew from 400 to 800 because of the draw of The Charleston Place. South Carolina School Boards Association I have been in the Continuing Education business for 25 years and have worked with many hotels. I have never had a better experience. American Motility Society Personable, not stuffy, five-diamond service. It’s a meeting planner’s dream since they are on top of everything. They are proactive and one step ahead of most other hotels. COBANK I have nothing but the best things to say about our experience. The customer service, food, and facilities were fantastic and our guests were extremely pleased with the accommodations. HUDSON AUTOMOTIVE I’ve been to many hotels, but never have I continued to reflect back on the professionalism and charm of the staff. FEDEX I literally haven’t ever been to a hotel where the fabric of the place just sang because of the people who just so obviously loved their own hotel and were so proud to work there. CONDE NAST TRAVELER Off-site events were great—the harbor cruise, plantation tours, carriage rides and Yorktown dinner were all spectacular. AMERIS Bank The program went on without any hitches and our Awards Banquet was knocked right out of the park… I truly appreciate all of you doing such an amazing job. It was flawless and well done. Everyone loved The Charleston Place! UNITED LABORATORIES, INC. Tell Us About Your Event Prefer to talk? Indulge Charleston continues to wow visitors from around the world with its mix of natural beauty, storied history, and vibrant culture. Here, you’ll immerse yourself in it all. From rejuvenating spa services to historic adventures and culinary explorations, you’ll find something amazing for every taste, mood, and occasion. Made with joy in mind Exclusive Offers and Delights Arrive in Style Enjoy 10% off your stay, complimentary valet parking, and two nights of elevated comfort and convenience. With curated amenities and a seamless arrival, this offer makes it easy to experience Charleston in effortless style. Details Luxury accommodations Seamless arrival with complimentary valet parking Nightly turndown service In-room welcome amentity Valid for stays now through March 31. Two-night minimum required. Blackout dates apply, including . Offer is subject to availability and may include additional restrictions. Disclaimer: February 13-14, March 13-14, and March 27-28 Book Now Enhance Your Stay with Club Level Access Elevate your stay with exclusive access to our Club Lounge, now relocated to a refreshed floor plan for a limited time. Enjoy personalized service, dedicated staff, and complimentary culinary offerings, from breakfast to after-dinner indulgences, in a reimagined atmosphere of luxury. Details Luxury accommodations Club Lounge access Reserve Stay A Little Longer Why stay two nights when you can enjoy greater savings and even more time to explore Charleston by staying three consecutive nights? Extend your getaway and savor every moment of luxury, charm, and unforgettable experiences. Details Luxury accommodations Up to 15% off a three-night stay Reserve Breakfast in Charleston After a glorious night’s sleep, awaken to a delicious breakfast in bed or at The Palmetto Cafe, where fresh, locally inspired dishes start your day on a delightful note. Details Luxury accommodations Daily breakfast at The Palmetto Cafe Subject to availability. Restrictions may apply. Not combinable with any other packages or offers. Valid for new bookings only. Disclaimer: Reserve The Cooper I Experience Experience Charleston from the water with a private charter aboard our custom Hinckley yacht. Available only to guests of The Charleston Place, this experience offers a serene and sophisticated way to explore the city’s historic harbor, all from the comfort of a beautifully appointed vessel, Cooper I. Whether you’re celebrating something special or simply chasing the horizon, this package invites you to slow down, take in the sea breeze, and see the Holy City from a fresh perspective. Details Luxury accommodations two-hour A private, captain-led charter aboard The Cooper I , our custom Hinckley yacht Flexible sail time, arranged seamlessly through our Concierge team A bespoke welcome amenity awaits as you step aboard the Hinckley Disclaimer: Subject to availability. Restrictions may apply. Not combinable with any other packages or offers. Valid for new bookings only. Reserve The Suite Life Lounge in a luxurious and spacious suite and embrace the charm of our cosmopolitan hideaway as you savor breakfast in bed or in our garden cafe.
